newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian bond exchange auction totals 13.48 bln bfr.
newsitem.headline: Belgian bond exchange auction totals 13.48 bln bfr.

text.p: The Belgian Treasury's bond exchange auction on Tuesday totalled 13.48 billion francs, the Treasury said in a statement BELE.

At the auction, participants could exchange the May 1997 linear bond (code 266) against the following bonds: April 1999 (code 264), March 2001 (code 285), June 2002 (code 259), May 2006 (code 283) and July 2008 (code 268).
